scripts.test: npm run test:python && npm run test:js
scripts.lint:py: venv/bin/python -m flake8 tests/ --select=E,W --statistics || python3 -m flake8 tests/ --select=E,W --statistics
scripts.lint:py:full: venv/bin/python -m flake8 tests/ validate_docs_diagrams.py || python3 -m flake8 tests/ validate_docs_diagrams.py
scripts.lint:py:complexity: venv/bin/python -m flake8 tests/ --select=C --statistics || python3 -m flake8 tests/ --select=C --statistics
scripts.lint:css: if find . -name '*.css' -type f -not -path './node_modules/*' -not -path './venv/*' | grep -q .; then stylelint **/*.css; else echo '‚ÑπÔ∏è No CSS files found to lint'; fi
scripts.lint:css:fix: if find . -name '*.css' -type f -not -path './node_modules/*' -not -path './venv/*' | grep -q .; then stylelint **/*.css --fix; else echo '‚ÑπÔ∏è No CSS files found to fix'; fi
scripts.lint:json: find . -name '*.json' -not -path './node_modules/*' -not -path './venv/*' -exec node -e 'try { JSON.parse(require("fs").readFileSync("{}", "utf8")); console.log("‚úì {}"); } catch(e) { console.error("‚úó {}: " + e.message); process.exit(1); }' \;
scripts.lint:ci: npm run lint:js && npm run lint:py && npm run lint:html && npm run lint:css && npm run lint:json && npm run lint:yaml
scripts.lint: npm run lint:js && npm run lint:py && npm run lint:html && npm run lint:css && npm run lint:json && npm run lint:yaml && npm run lint:md
scripts.lint:fix: npm run lint:js:fix && npm run lint:css:fix && npm run lint:md:fix && npm run format && (venv/bin/python -m autopep8 --in-place --aggressive --max-line-length=88 tests/ || python3 -m autopep8 --in-place --aggressive --max-line-length=88 tests/)
